summary_text: Enthusiastic Engineering Graduate with strong aptitude and coding skills in C/C++/Java. Completed TCS NQT preparation with focus on Data Structures and Algorithms. Eager to join TCS Ninja profile and contribute to digital transformation projects.
common_mistakes: Failing to mention NQT score (if good), missing core CS subjects (OS, DBMS) which are asked in interviews, or not highlighting final year project details clearly.
seo_title: Best Resume Format for TCS Ninja Freshers (2026) | Free Builder
meta_description: Create a winning resume for TCS Ninja recruitment. Free ATS-friendly builder for freshers. Highlight NQT score, C/Java skills, and projects. Build instantly.
keywords: resume format for tcs off campus
resume for software engineer fresher tcs

faqs.q: Should I mention my NQT Score?
faqs.a: Yes! If you have a good NQT score (above 70%), explicitly mention it in a 'Certifications' or 'Achievements' section. It's a direct validator for TCS.

faqs.q: What projects should I include for TCS?
faqs.a: Include your final year academic project. Clearly state your role, technologies used, and the outcome. TCS interviewers often ask deep questions about your main project.

industry_context: TCS is India's largest IT recruiter. The Ninja profile is their standard entry-level role. They look for strong fundamentals in one programming language and core CS concepts.
ats_tips: Mention 'TCS NQT' if you have cleared it
List 'C' and 'Java' explicitly as they are core to TCS training

summary_text: Detail-oriented B.Tech graduate with proficiency in Python and Java. Certified in Infosys Springboard courses. Strong foundation in SDLC and agile methodologies. Seeking System Engineer role at Infosys to leverage technical skills.
common_mistakes: Not mentioning specific programming languages, having a cluttered layout (Infosys prefers clean, simple formats), or missing academic achievements.
seo_title: Best Resume Format for Infosys System Engineer (2026) | Free Builder
meta_description: Create free resume format for Infosys System Engineer role. ATS-optimized for freshers. Highlight Python, Java, and project work. No signup required.

faqs.q: Does Infosys require a specific resume format?
faqs.a: No specific format, but they prefer clean, professional layouts. Avoid flashy graphics. Use a standard reverse-chronological format.

faqs.q: Should I mention Infosys Springboard certifications?
faqs.a: Absolutely. It shows your proactive interest in the company and that you are already familiar with their learning ecosystem.

industry_context: Infosys recruits in large numbers for the System Engineer role. They value trainability and communication skills highly along with technical basics.

faqs.q: Is Wipro strict about resume format?
faqs.a: They expect a standard professional format. Ensure your contact details and education are error-free as they are verified strictly.

industry_context: Wipro's Elite National Talent Hunt (NLTH) is their major hiring program. They look for candidates with good aptitude and basic coding skills.
ats_tips: Mention 'Wipro Elite' or 'NLTH' in objective if applying specifically

faqs.q: What is the difference between GenC and GenC Next resumes?
faqs.a: For GenC Next, highlight advanced skills like Full Stack, Cloud, or AI/ML projects. For GenC, focus on strong fundamentals and aptitude.

industry_context: Cognizant hires heavily through GenC (mass hiring) and GenC Next (premium hiring). Highlighting digital skills key.
